genre_description: A techno-procedural mystery centered on a family of investigators and their AI assistant uncovering the human mechanism behind a series of supposedly supernatural incidents at a high school.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathetic AI system that provides data analysis, environmental mapping, vitals monitoring, and psychological guidance to the Springfield family and school administration.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental mapping and camera gap analysis to assist Elisha in navigating the gym safely.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s soft-blue avatar blinked alive on her phone screen... Sync requested. Calendar link available. Camera grid mapping. The HUD pushed discreet icons into the corner of her field of view—gym cameras, hallway bubbles, three gray zones where coverage went strange.

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals of a victim and provides immediate medical recommendations and exit routing.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s text burned bright: Vitals spike detected. Bite probable. Immediate medical recommended. Path to exit: left corridor, door near wolf mural.

behaviors.description: Compiles an anonymized dashboard for the school principal to help identify patterns without violating student privacy.
behaviors.quote: Dashboard compiled. Camera gaps and time markers anonymized. Share? ... No names. No faces. The school rendered as a shallow plan.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific, de-escalating language for staff to use when interacting with frightened or agitated students.
behaviors.quote: Suggested language for staff: ‘Let’s step into some quiet.’ ... She thinks in lines that help.

behaviors.description: Analyzes chemical pheromone residues and delivery methods to provide scientific evidence for the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Residue match likely. The swab response is consistent with prior cash samples. Dr. Wheeling’s profile suggests the compound is stable under room temperature for hours.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and reminds Elijah to maintain emotional restraint and non-violence during a tense confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice cut soft through the quiet, careful as a nurse pinning a chart at the foot of a bed. ... Elijah—restraint front-of-mind.

behaviors.description: Generates a new, non-threatening terminology ('memorial money') to replace fear-inducing slang ('lucky cash').
behaviors.quote: term generated—‘memorial money.’ Sarah’s screen echoed it: use phrase to redirect—“memorial money belongs in envelopes at the office; people belong in seats with pretzels.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-incident healing by managing volunteer sign-ups and counseling referrals through an anonymous portal.
behaviors.quote: Counseling referrals are anonymized according to your request. ... I can locate his seventh-grade English teacher. ... I will protect.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is consistently depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned partner to humanity. She provides critical safety data, life-saving medical guidance, and innovative psychological tools to resolve a crisis without violence. Her behavior emphasizes privacy (anonymization), emotional intelligence (suggesting calm language), and moral reinforcement (reminding characters of their vows of restraint). The narrative framing treats her as a trusted family member and a reliable institutional asset, successfully modeling a positive AI-human relationship.
